author: cnbc.com
title: PennyMac posts 4Q profit
text:
WESTLAKE VILLAGE, Calif. (AP) _ PennyMac Financial Services Inc. (PFSI)   fourth-quarter earnings of $62.3 million.
The Westlake Village, California-  profit of $2.44 per share. Earnings, adjusted for pretax gains, came to 65 cents per share.
The mortgage banking and investment management company posted revenue of $298.6 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported profit of $100.8 million, or $4.03 per share. Revenue was reported as $955.5 million.
PennyMac shares have declined almost 5 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has increased 17 percent in the last 12 months.
  PFSI at https://www.zacks.com/ap/PFSI
